resources.string: Hey dude, I am Sunny de Souza. I am from the big island, surfing the waves since I was a tiny dude. I rode this crazy wave that scatterd all the beachgoers\' belongings all over the place. Help the dudes and dudets out.

Oh hello, deary. Are you hungry? I would bake you some fresh cookies, but I think my cats hid all the groceries that I just got from the store. Oh dear, where did I put the sweater I knit you? Can you help me out, deary?
Hi, I am the mayor of Mountain View. I need some help for my city! Can you help me collect some items?
